title: Scallops with apple, black pudding, apple salad and an apple and vanilla purée
description: Apples are the star of this sensational starter. The sweetness of the apples are balanced by the savoury black pudding.
ingredients: 2 green apples, peeled, cored and sliced
300g/10½oz Granny Smith apples, peeled, cored and chopped
1 vanilla pod, split lengthways and seeds scraped out
salt and freshly ground black pepper
